channel.title: talks on Adib.notes
channel.description: Recent content in talks on Adib.notes

item.title: RFM Segmentation for Finding The Best Customer
item.description: I talked about basic customer segmentation using RFM and clustering approach to find big spender customer, and how we deal with different type of customer. Slides can be found here

item.title: Data Visualization
item.description: I talked about basic data visualization, tips and technique. No recording published, but you can find the slides here.

item.title: Computer Vision for Vehicle Detection
item.description: My talk about basic computer vision techniques to detect vehicle from a camera installed at the road. The full talk can be watched on Here
